Content.Text:
<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So you're the new farmer who moved to this
town, huh? Not quite how I imagined you...
<PAGE>
Oh, but where are my manners? I'm Melanie. It's
nice to meet you.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>! Good morning!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Great day, isn't it?
Now, what trouble should I get myself into
today...?

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hello, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. Hello.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, <MYNAME>. You gonna play with me
again today?

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good evening, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. Good evening.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. Have you had dinner
yet?

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's a lovely day, isn't it? Perfect day for playing!
But what to play, that's the question...

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
On rainy days like this, I usually just play in my
room, even though my room is booooooring...

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's a beautiful day, isn't it? But it's also
hot...which means I should go to the river. Yes,
I think that's just what I'll do!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Rain! My old enemy! I'll have to play at home
today.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's a nice day today. I wanna go on a picnic!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
On rainy days like this, I usually just play in my
room. But I always secretly hope that someone
will come to visit me!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's a beautiful day today! Though it's a little too
cold for my tastes...

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah, snow. The slightly frozen form of my old
enemy, rain. If it piles up enough, maybe I can
make a snowman!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
There's a typhoon out there today. I think that
means you should stay inside!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
It's snowing so much, I'm afraid my house
might get buried!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey, <MYNAME>. You've been looking pretty
happy these days!
<PAGE>
Are you dating <CHARANAME0>? Oho, you are,
aren't you?! See, you're blushing! ...Hee hee...

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's fun just standing here and watching people.
That includes you, <MYNAME>! So go on about
your business! Let me watch you up but good!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I come here sometimes and play with Elise, or
whoever's available.
<PAGE>
Once I start running around, though, they tend
to get angry...

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I come to this forest a lot. So does Lutz. And
when we're both here, we play together ALL THE
TIME.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
There are lots of rabbits around here, and
sometimes, I play with them!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I come to this forest a lot. So does Lutz. And
when we're both here, we play together ALL DAY
LONG.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sparrows come to this forest a lot, and
sometimes I'll feed them.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
The air is so crisp and clean around here, don't
you think?

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Fritz and Giorgio play with me a lot.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I come here sometimes, but I get really tired.
Must be even tougher for you farm folk!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This field is really out of the way. Must be hard
work for whoever has to tend it.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is Eda really coming all the way here every day
to water crops? Farm work sure isn't easy, huh?

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My daddy told me there're raccoon dogs around
here. Is that true? Are they disguised as people?
Are YOU a raccoon dog...?

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Who's tending this field these days? Oh, wait, I
remember.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
How can this flower garden be so beautiful?!
Giorgio really is a genius!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My sister told me about animals called ermines.
Do they really exist? Do they live around here?

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I come here sometimes, but I get really tired.
Must be even tougher for you farm folk!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This farmland looks really good. I hear Fritz is
the one in charge of it, which is kind of
surprising. He's much better than I thought!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I often pass though the paddies here, and
wonder about them. They're for growing rice,
right?

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I like watching water wheels. There's
something...I dunno, funny about the way they
spin! Makes me laugh.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Elise is sure working hard, huh? She's the one in
charge of the paddies, right? I sometimes see
her checking on them.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, hey! Where are you off to? Me, I'm taking a
walk!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>! Are you taking a walk too?

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>, may I ask where you're from?
<PAGE>
Since my family runs the inn, a lot of people
come to my house. Talking to them has gotten
me really interested in the world outside town.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>When I grow up, I'm going to go visit other
towns like my sister!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Do you make your own clothes? I can make
clothes for dolls, myself.
<PAGE>
It's fun to make clothes and dress up dolls.
Maybe someday, I'll make you some people-
sized clothes and they'll be juuuuust right!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Do you like working on the
farm?
<PAGE>
It looks fun to me since you can talk to animals
all the time, but I bet it's a lot harder than it
looks, huh?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But it's probably worth it, too! Growing flowers
you like in a big garden, and taking care of
animals, seems like so much fun!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What do you think about Lutz?
<PAGE>
He's always got his nose buried in his studies,
every single day. And I know that's good...but he
wants to play too, just like anybody else!
<PAGE>
So whenever he's free, I try to play with him as
much as possible.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Listen, when I grow up, I want to work in other
towns like my sister does. In fact, if I can, I
want to live by myself!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>But that means my dad has to be pretty much
alone, huh? And that's sad. I know how much
he'd miss us.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>So if you can, you should talk to him. Get to
know him. Be there for him when I can't be.
Please?

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I was little, my sister played with me a lot.
There was one particular doll we always liked to
pose and stuff.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>We made a house and clothes for it, too! It was
so much fun...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Even now, I play with that same doll whenever
I'm alone. My sister gave it to me. It's my
treasure! ♪

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Did you come to see me
today, too?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I kind of knew you were on your way. I don't
know how. I just had a hunch.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I wanted to play with somebody anyway, so
your timing is perfect! What do you think? Let's
play!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>Oh, hey, what a nice <BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>!
It's my favorite!
<PAGE>
I'm so happy, <MYNAME>! Thank you!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>Oh, hey, what a nice present! I love it! Thank
you so much!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah, is that what I think it is?! That's so nice!
Thank you!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Huh? Is this for me? Thank you so much!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is this...a present for me? Uh...thank you...

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Eww, is that...yeah, that's kinda gross. You don't
want it either?
<PAGE>
Oh. Oh! It's for me, huh? Well...thanks, I guess!
It is the thought that counts.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R>Whoawhoawhoa! I can't eat spicy
<BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE> like that!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>But...I guess you did bring it to me as a present,
so I'll...take it home. I wonder if my daddy
would like it...

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, how lovely! It's magnificent! Thank you
very much!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, it's all gold and sparkly! Thank you so much!
♪

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
It may be sparkling, but it's still gross. 'Course,
you did bring it all this way, so...thank you...
Let's not give her a present right now.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>! Long time no see!
...You have a present for me? Well, I can't say I
need any presents right now. I'm sorry.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you. But if I accept too many presents, I'll
be scolded by my daddy, so I'm going to have to
turn it down. Sorry!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, hey, what a nice <BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>!
It's my favorite!
<PAGE>
Is this a birthday present for me? Wow, that's so
nice of you, <MYNAME>! Thank you!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What? A birthday present?! Wow, that's really
sweet of you!
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>Oh, it's so lovely! Thank you so much -- I love it!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, for me? For my birthday?! You are so
thoughtful! Thank you!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Huh? Is this a present for my birthday? I'm so
happy you remembered! Thank you!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Is this...a birthday present for me?
...Th-thank you.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Eww, gross! Ulgh, ulgh, ulgh! Why'd you bring
that? Is it... No... It couldn't be because today
is...
<PAGE>
...I see. It is. It's a birthday present for me.
Well...thank you for the thought...

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, you brought me a birthday present?
Sweet!
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R><FACE_SAD>Eep!
<PAGE>
See, I'm... Well, I don't...really like this very
much. But since it's a present and all, I'll take it.
It's...the thought that counts.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, it's beautiful! I absolutely love it!
<PAGE>
What? It's a birthday present for me?! Thank you
so much!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, is this a birthday present for me? Wow, it's
like, solid gold! Are you sure I can have it?
Thank you so much!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
It may be sparkling, but it's still gross. 'Course,
it's also a birthday present, so...thank you...

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, what a cute rabbit! Look at its mouth
twitch!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Man, these little guys are so cute!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, it's an ermine. Look at the funny face it's
got!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Awww, look at the cutie-pie! I feed this little guy
a lot.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
My, what a strange rabbit. Its hair looks all
smooth and fluffy!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Awww, look at the cute chick!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I'm...not very good with chickens.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, that's a cute dog. Are you its master? I
want a dog too!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Aww, what a cute dog! Isn't it a little fat,
though?

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This dog looks pretty smart. ...Give me your
paw, little one!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Aww, what a cute dog! Isn't it a little fat,
though?

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, what a cute cat! I love cats!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>But since my daddy's allergic to them, I'm not
allowed to have one...

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Aww, what a cute cat! Isn't it a little fat,
though? Fat cat, fat cat! Hee hee...

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Aww, what a cute cat! Its hair is so fluffy!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But since my daddy's allergic to them, I'm not
allowed to have one...

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Aww, what a cute cat! Isn't it a little fat,
though? Fat cat, fat cat! Hee hee...

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, what a beautiful flower! Guess today's the
Flower Fair, huh? Thanks!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I heard about the blue feather from my sister.
People give it to the person they love, right?
<PAGE>
...You're not trying to give it to ME, are you?!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Aren't you supposed to give that ring to the
person you want to date?
<PAGE>
...You're not thinking of dating ME, are you?!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, this ribbon is beautiful! And such a pretty
color, too. I wonder what's inside...

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yaaay! It's a present! What could it be...?

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy birthday, <MYNAME>! Here's a present,
from me to you! Come on, open it!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy birthday, <MYNAME>! I wanted to get
you a present, but I couldn't do it in time. I'm
really sorry...

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>! Long time no see! Can you
play with me today?

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, what a pretty outfit! It looks really cute. And
that blouse is gorgeous!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, what a beautiful outfit. I love the coloring!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I like your pink scarf. It's cute!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, that's a nice outfit! I'd like to wear
something like that myself someday. ♪

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Those clothes are very cute. But then, I'm a
sucker for anything pink!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've never seen clothes like the ones you're
wearing. But they're very nice! I wanna try them
on too!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I like that vest. The pink pattern on it is super
pretty.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I like that dress. Pink is my favorite color, you
know!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That pink coat is really nice. Just my style!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, that's really nice! I'd like to wear
something like that myself someday!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a cool outfit. It looks kind of familiar... Is
it from some person named "Yur Majisty" or
something?
<PAGE>
I haven't seen it around too much, but I kind of
like it. ♪

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ooh, it's PINK! I love pink!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That's a cute outfit! But I think it'd look better on
me.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a strange outfit! I'm not sure if that counts
as stylish or...kitschy. But it looks good, either
way! ♪

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a cool costume. Are you pretending to be
a doctor or something?

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, you look amazing! I want to dress like that
too!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, you look amazing! I want to dress like that
too!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, you look really mature and sophisticated. I
bet my daddy would be very happy if he saw
you in that!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh! Are you applying to be one of Elise's maids
or something?

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ooh, look, a bear! Won't you please play with
me? I'd like that beary much!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What a nice red hat! It looks really good on you!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, now, that's a peculiar hat! What did you
say it's called? A "bonnet"?

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What a cute flower! I might want to put one in
my hair, too...

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, that's a cute hat! It's pink, and it's so, so
tiny! I think it'd look good on me, too. ♪

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a pretty standard hat for a farmer, right?

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That's what they call a headband, right? It's so
cute!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ooh, look, they're black cat ears! Sooooooo
cute! I want to wear them soooooo bad!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ooh, look, they're white cat ears! Sooooooo
cute! I want to wear them soooooo bad!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That hat is like what witches wear! So cool! ♪

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, what are you listening to with those
headphones?

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_PATI>
...Sis, where are you going...? Sis...

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm sleepy already. How about we play
tomorrow?

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Daddy says I shouldn't talk with my mouth full,
so could you wait 'til I'm done eating?

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
One day, we'll all go to the beach together. And
when we do, I'm going to bring an umbrella like
that with me, and I'll be the talk of the shore!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Seems like a really smart dog, huh?

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, can I play with that swing or is it just for
decoration?

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yay, there's a seesaw here! I bet Lutz and I
would be close enough in weight to make it go!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oooh, a slide! ...Oh, but since I'm wearing a
skirt, I won't get any traction on it, so I'd better
keep off. Nuts!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is that cow made of snow? Wow, I didn't know
snow could do that!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That cow statue is pretty big, huh?

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Pink is an awesome color, isn't it? It just looks
so feminine! ♪

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Whoa, it's so bright! Get enough white together
and everything looks like it's shining.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
The decor feels very "summer." Makes me
wanna swim, swim, swim!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This place looks so cold. Is that because of the
decor?

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, tea ceremony! ♪ I really want to try that
with my sister and my daddy someday.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There are a lot of flowers that seem to bloom in
winter. Does that mean they're fake flowers?

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I see more people coming to this town lately
than ever before. It looks so full of life and fun
now!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I hear there are lots of stores in the Trade Depot.
I'm going to ask my daddy to buy something for
me!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My sister told me that not too many people
know this town. That's kinda sad, don't you
think?

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If this town gets just a little busier, more
customers will come to stay at our inn, right?

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wish more children would come here to play.
Instead, it's all crusty old traders!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My daddy told me a trader came to the Trade
Depot from Ice Country.
<PAGE>
I hear you can buy super rare products there that
are unlike anything you've ever seen before!

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here's your allowance for today. Don't spend it
all in one place!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Look, it's a pink bench! EEEEEE!! Since that's
my favorite color, this is now MY bench! ♪

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That bird always faces the direction the wind is
blowing from. That's what my sister told me.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Totem poles have lots of faces on them, which
makes them really fun to look at!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
One day, we'll all go to the beach together. And
when we do, I'm going to bring a beach chair
like that with me, and I'll be the talk of the shore!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That fountain sure looks nice. I love that kind of
thing!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, can I play with that swing or is it just for
decoration?

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ooh, look, a jungle gym! Let's see who can
climb up it faster!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, what a nice castle! Maybe I can live in a
castle like this someday.

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Look, it's an animal made of sand! It's so cute!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's nice just to sit in the plaza and play with
your doll there every now and again, don't you
think?

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wonder who made that snowman... It's really
pro-grade stuff!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've seen that snow house thingy in a book
before, I think. They say it's warm inside, right?

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is that sheep made of snow? Wow, I didn't
know snow could do that!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is that bird made of snow? Yes, or snow?!
Hahaha!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I want to ride on that panda! Can I? Pleeeeease?

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hear there's a board that makes sounds, but
nobody'll tell me how to make it make sounds!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I love pink flowers! They're so cute!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I love pink flowers! They're so cute!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I love pink flower baskets! They're so cute!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That sheep statue almost looks real!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I want to ride on that horse statue, but I think I'll
get in trouble if I do. I have to control myself!
But control is HARD!

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Pink fences sure are beautiful, aren't they? Who
needs picket when they can "pink-it"?

<FACE_MELTY><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That fence's pattern sure is interesting, isn't it?
